Configuring Local Disk Policy

To configure the Local Disk Policy, perform the following:

 1. Select the Organization from the drop-down list. By default, root is displayed.

 2. Enter the Number of local disk policies in the textbox and click Add to generate the local disk policy. Table 7-3 lists the elements in the SAN Boot Policy.

Table 7-3 Elements in Local Disk Policy

Item

Description

Name

Lists the name of the Local Disk. This field is editable.

Description

Lists the description of the Local Disk. This field is editable.

Mode

Select the mode of configuration to connect the device.

Protect Configuration

Select the protection level of the configuration.

Organization

Select the desired configuration.

Figure 7-5 Local Disk Policy

 3. Click Save and next to proceed further.
